name: Jewels X Connect
description:
Jewels X Connect is an addictive and exciting adventure match 3 game filled with colorful jewels crunching effects! This jewel game has well designed puzzles for you to play in anytime and anywhere!

FEATURES
- Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.
- More than 100 addictive jewel quest levels
- Helpful magical boosters to win jewel stars.
- Auto hint when you jewel quest but could not find one match.
